I bought the Aureum dupe Chunky Gold Rectangle Stud Earrings. The ones with the lines that are the dupes for the Aureum Collective ones. They are super lightweight and the gold is not garish or anything. It's very flattering. However, the material is very cheap and I do hope they don't tarnish too soon. That being said, you hardly know they are on when you're wearing them and I've received many compliments on them. I would give it a 4.5 if I could.

I thought it would be that wash away gold but it’s the gold that doesn’t tarnish. And it’s pretty sturdy but not heavy! My ears are very sensitive so I can’t put heavy earrings on but these are perfect as it doesn’t weigh down my ear lobes.
